level.heading: Repealer.
level.text: All orders and parts of orders in conflict with any of the provisions of this chapter are hereby repealed, except that any regulations adopted or promulgated by virtue of the authority granted by such orders, shall remain in force until properly revised, amended or repealed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-137
level.text: For Law 14-137, see notes following ยง 50-921.01.
